attributes.title: Factz
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app and it glitched...I pretty sure they stole my email,number,credit card info, etc
They have merchandise and when I ordered it ,i got the swastika flag and was terrified.I tweeted about it and was on the FBI watch list.Worst app -3000/10 if I go missing this is why.

I ordered from it again a few days later and got a posters of trumps private parts o am disgusted, terrified, frightened, aghast, alarmed, and frozen to the CORE after receiving my package.Not only that but the box that it came in had the n-word written all over it. 
I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP MY REVIEW SAYS A LOT...trump doesn’t care about his supporters, followers, allies, advocates, backbone and adherent

attributes.title: Great App
attributes.review: I just want to point out that this app was made for the people who support him not those who wish to take it down.TRUMP 2020

attributes.title: Trash...
attributes.review: This is the saddest I've ever been.. This Cheeto orange 🍊looks God had me hooked when I saw this app <_<....but to believe him is the same as believeing that I will ever be happy again.... This app has ruined me.... The TWO WHOLE WEEKS that I spent waiting for this app to download is just absurd.... Here I was thinking I'm sad but this app just killed me... Worst part when I open the app I'm greated with a picture of Trump kissing his own daughter and holding her ass!!! Than loud blood Curdleing music was blaring through the app even when my volume was on the lowest setting.... My ears literally started bleeding and I had to visit the er for two whole days... 😔😔 I thought it would get better after my father had broken the phone... But it would replay the pictures and the music in my sleep and I would see him every time I opened my eyes.... 😭😭 I'm now diagnosed with PTSD and am seeing a therapist as I fear the orange Cheeto may never leave my head... God bless anyone that thinks about this app and I'm praying for the one who have already gone due to the Trump 2020 app.... Blessed be.... 🧚🧚🧚🥰😭😭🥺❤️❤️🧚🧚🧚🥰🥰🥰😭😔😔😔🥺🥺🥺🥺❤️❤️❤️❤️🧚🧚🧚🧚🧚🥰🥰🥰😯🥰😭😭😭😭😭😫😫🥺🥺❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

attributes.title: Needs to be taken down
attributes.review: THIS PRESIDENT IS THINKING OF TAKING AWAY AN APP THAT GIVES MILLIONS OF TEENAGERS HAPPINESS. FOR ME THAT APP IS THE ONLY REASON WHY IM ALIVE. IF HE BANS THIS APP ITS MOST LIKELY THAT THE NUMBERS OF SUICIDES IN THE US WILL SKY ROCKET!!! SO THE NEXT TIME YOU SAY YOU ARE GOING TO GET RID OF TIKTOK THINK ABOUT THE PEOPLE WHO WILL SUFFER! OH WAIT ALMOST FORGOT THAT OUR DUMBASS OF A PRESIDENT DOESNT CARE ABOUT ANYONES LIVES OTHER THAN HIS OWN!!! 🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼
